Package com.example.eventsnapqr

Class FirebaseController

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventsnapqr.FirebaseController
public class FirebaseController extends Object
class to interact with the collections in the firestore database

      Parameters:
      userId - given user to increment
      eventId - the event in which the user checked in
